title: TVS Motor vehicle sales grow 23 pc to 339,513 units in Jan
description: TVS Motor reported a 23% increase in vehicle sales to 339,513 units in January. Two-wheeler sales increased by 25%, with domestic sales spiking by 24% to 268,233 units. Motorcycle volumes grew by 29%, reaching 155,611 units. The scooter segment saw a growth of 24% with sales increasing to 132,290 units. The company also witnessed a 34% year-on-year growth in electric vehicle sales at 16,276 units. Three-wheeler sales stood at 9,576 units.
